Docs.param: The builder for the entity type being configured.
Docs.summary: Configures the discriminator column used to identify which entity type each row in a table represents when an inheritance hierarchy is mapped to a single table in a relational database.
Docs.returns: A builder that allows the discriminator column to be configured.
